title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message: Initially getting short fan spin on power. When triggering on off, I do get Vcore during fan spin. Fan spin lasts a couple seconds. Get full fan spin in SMC bypass mode.

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message:
So the board stays on in SMC bypass mode?
In such case, check all SMC sensors, at pages 49/50.

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message: I caused a short on this board somewhere and have .016V short on pin 2 of L7630... Is this board trash?

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message: I think 0.016 reading is good for PCH core.

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message:
U7940 was the problem. Board starts again. Went through SMC sensors on page 49/50.
in bypass there are some at 0V.

 I get 0V at these:

SMC_GFX_VSENSE/ISENSE
SMC_CPU_ISENSE
SMC_CPUVCCIO_ISENSE

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message:
0V shouldn't be a problem.
SMC can stop the board if detects an above limit error.

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message: BMON ISENSE at 3.45V would that cause shut down? schematic says max 3.3V?

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message:
More than sure.
Check resistance between pins 17/18 of ISL6259.

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message:
2.7 ohms at pins 17,18 ISL

ISL bad I assume?

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message:
Check components in SMC_BMON_ISENSE area.
Its level should be lower.
Post CHGR_BMON also.

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message:
Almost all components for the circuit are NO STUFF, R5422 checks out. 

CHGR_BMON is 3.45

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message:
It is very high!
Did you check resistance directly between pins 17/18???
Check their traces and solders.

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message: Yes. Above it's at 2.7 ohms at pins 17/18> I'll swap the ISL and see if it changes

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message:
CHanged the ISL and now boots.

As always THANKS!

title: 820-2936 short fan spin
message:
You're welcome!

Try to understand what a signal means, then you will know the way to go.
